name: SquaredGlass 7©
description:
Sup dude,

you're messy asf, you probably should clean up your desktop before idk A VIRUS mess it all up even more... LE MéCHANT !!!! IL EST TRèS MéCHANT !! Be ware of Rooty the virus.

Istg these new generations, gotta explain everything to them...
